mapper.insert: insert into second_hand_car (car_id, car_age, car_type, car_kilometre, car_phone, car_people, car_time, car_img, car_status, car_original_price, car_now_price) values (#{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carKilometre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carOriginalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNowPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into second_hand_car
car_id,
car_age,
car_type,
car_kilometre,
car_phone,
car_people,
car_time,
car_img,
car_status,
car_original_price,
car_now_price,

#{carAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{carKilometre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{carPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{carPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{carTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{carImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

insert into second_hand_car ( car_age, car_type, car_kilometre, car_phone, car_people, car_time, car_img, car_original_price, car_now_price) values ( #{carAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carKilometre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{carImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carOriginalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carNowPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select s.car_id, s.car_age, s.car_type, s.car_kilometre, s.car_phone, s.car_people, s.car_time, s.car_img, s.car_status, s.car_original_price, s.car_now_price , c.car_type_id,c.car_type_value from second_hand_car s,car_type c where s.car_type=c.car_type_id and s.car_id=#{carId}

select s.car_id, s.car_age, s.car_type, s.car_kilometre, s.car_phone, s.car_people, s.car_time, s.car_img, s.car_status, s.car_original_price, s.car_now_price , c.car_type_id,c.car_type_value from second_hand_car s left join car_type c on s.car_type=c.car_type_id
and s.car_type=#{carType}
